con:config.con:query: select cust.custnum, cust.billcycle, cc.ccfname, cc.cclname, cc.ccemail, ca.co_code, dn.dn_num, cust.cspassword, r.shdes, r.des, cd.cd_sm_num, p.port_num from directory_number@COND_TO_BSCSRAC dn, contract_all@COND_TO_BSCSRAC ca, storage_medium@COND_TO_BSCSRAC sm, contr_services_cap@COND_TO_BSCSRAC csc, customer_all@COND_TO_BSCSRAC cust, contr_devices@COND_TO_BSCSRAC cd, port@COND_TO_BSCSRAC p, rateplan@COND_TO_BSCSRAC r, ccontact_all@COND_TO_BSCSRAC cc where dn.dn_id = csc.dn_id and csc.co_id = ca.co_id and ca.customer_id = cust.customer_id and cust.customer_id = cc.CUSTOMER_ID and ca.co_id = cd.co_id and cd.port_id = p.port_id and ca.tmcode = r.tmcode and cd.cd_sm_num = sm.sm_serialnum and sm.sm_status = 'a' and csc.MAIN_DIRNUM = 'X' and ca.CH_STATUS = 'a' and p.PORT_STATUS = 'a' and csc.CS_DEACTIV_DATE is null and r.shdes like 'TMP29' and not exists (select 'x' from portal_user where msisdn = dn.dn_num) and rownum =1

con:settings.con:setting: All

true

con:config.con:query: select * from ( select cust.custnum, cust.custcode, case cust.billcycle when '21' then 'Bill Cycle 1' when '22' then 'Bill Cycle 2' else null end as billcycle, case cust.cscurbalance when 0 then '0.0' else to_char(cust.cscurbalance,'999999.0') end as current_balance, (select to_char(max(ohinvamt_doc),'999999.0') from orderhdr_all@COND_TO_BSCSRAC where customer_id = cust.customer_id and ohstatus = 'IN') as Previous_Balance, (select to_char(max(ohpostgl), 'YYYY-MM-DD') from orderhdr_all@COND_TO_BSCSRAC where customer_id = cust.customer_id and ohstatus = 'IN') as Last_Bill_Date, cc.ccfname, cc.cclname, cc.ccemail, cc.ccstreet, cc.ccaddr1, cc.ccaddr2, cc.cccity, cc.cccounty, ca.co_code, dn.dn_num, cust.cspassword, r.shdes, r.des, cd.cd_sm_num, p.port_num, sm.sm_pin, sm.sm_puk, sm.sm_pin2, sm_puk2 from directory_number@COND_TO_BSCSRAC dn, contract_all@COND_TO_BSCSRAC ca, storage_medium@COND_TO_BSCSRAC sm, contr_services_cap@COND_TO_BSCSRAC csc, customer_all@COND_TO_BSCSRAC cust, contr_devices@COND_TO_BSCSRAC cd, port@COND_TO_BSCSRAC p, rateplan@COND_TO_BSCSRAC r, ccontact_all@COND_TO_BSCSRAC cc where dn.dn_id = csc.dn_id and csc.co_id = ca.co_id and ca.customer_id = cust.customer_id and cust.customer_id = cc.CUSTOMER_ID and ca.co_id = cd.co_id and cd.port_id = p.port_id and ca.tmcode = r.tmcode and cd.cd_sm_num = sm.sm_serialnum and sm.sm_status = 'a' and csc.MAIN_DIRNUM = 'X' and ca.CH_STATUS = 'a' and p.PORT_STATUS = 'a' and csc.CS_DEACTIV_DATE is null and cc.ccaddr1 is not null and r.shdes = 'TMP29' and not exists (select 'x' from profile_service@COND_TO_BSCSRAC where co_id = ca.co_id and sncode in (307,295,294)) and exists (select 'x' from profile_service@COND_TO_BSCSRAC where co_id = ca.co_id and sncode in (330,331,332,333,334,335,336)) and not exists (select 'x' from portal_user where msisdn = dn.dn_num) and exists (select 'x' from orderhdr_all@COND_TO_BSCSRAC where customer_id = cust.customer_id and ohstatus = 'IN') ORDER BY dbms_random.value) where rownum =1

con:testCase.name: Login Flow for no bundles and no usage

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="${#TestSuite#CUST_REG_Encoded_V2}"/> <con:entry key="User-Agent" value="MyTescoApp/1.1"/> <con:entry key="Accept" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>
true

con:config.con:query: select mp.des, mp.shdes, attr.value as allowance, udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes as unit, bal.actual_value as consumed, (attr.value - bal.actual_value) as remaining, case when bal.actual_value = 0 then '0.0' when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'M' and bal.actual_value = trunc(bal.actual_value) then to_char(bal.actual_value,'fm999999999999999990.0') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'M' and bal.actual_value != trunc(bal.actual_value) then to_char(bal.actual_value,'fm999999999999999990D99999999999999999') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'Sec' and bal.actual_value/60 = trunc(bal.actual_value/60) then to_char(bal.actual_value/60,'fm999999999999999990.0') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'Sec' and bal.actual_value/60 != trunc(bal.actual_value/60) then to_char(bal.actual_value/60,'fm999999999999999990D99999999999999999') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'MSG' and bal.actual_value = trunc(bal.actual_value) then to_char(bal.actual_value,'fm999999999999999990.0') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'MSG' and bal.actual_value != trunc(bal.actual_value) then to_char(bal.actual_value,'fm999999999999999990D99999999999999999') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'Byte' and bal.actual_value/1048576 = trunc(bal.actual_value/1048576) then to_char(bal.actual_value/1048576,'fm999999999999999990.0') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'Byte' and bal.actual_value/1048576 != trunc(bal.actual_value/1048576) then to_char(bal.actual_value/1048576,'fm999999999999999990D99999999999999999') end as consumed_portal_units, case when attr.value - bal.actual_value = 0 then '0.0' when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'M' and bal.actual_value = 0 then '0.0' when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'M' and bal.actual_value = trunc(bal.actual_value) then to_char(bal.actual_value,'fm999999999999999990.0') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'M' and bal.actual_value != trunc(bal.actual_value) then to_char(bal.actual_value,'fm999999999999999990D99999999999999999') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'Sec' and (attr.value - bal.actual_value)/60 = trunc((attr.value - bal.actual_value)/60) then to_char((attr.value - bal.actual_value)/60,'fm999999999999999990.0') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'Sec' and (attr.value - bal.actual_value)/60 != trunc((attr.value - bal.actual_value)/60) then to_char((attr.value - bal.actual_value)/60,'fm999999999999999990D99999999999999999') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'MSG' and attr.value - bal.actual_value = trunc(attr.value - bal.actual_value) then to_char(attr.value - bal.actual_value,'fm999999999999999990.0') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'MSG' and attr.value - bal.actual_value != trunc(attr.value - bal.actual_value) then to_char((attr.value - bal.actual_value),'fm999999999999999990D99999999999999999') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'Byte' and (attr.value - bal.actual_value)/1048576 = trunc((attr.value - bal.actual_value)/1048576) then to_char((attr.value - bal.actual_value)/1048576,'fm999999999999999990.0') when udc.unit_of_measurement_shdes = 'Byte' and (attr.value - bal.actual_value)/1048576 != trunc((attr.value - bal.actual_value)/1048576) then to_char((attr.value - bal.actual_value)/1048576,'fm999999999999999990D99999999999999999') end as remaining_portal_units from coc_ccpackage_thresh_attrs attr join COC_COSTCONTROL_PACKAGES pack on attr.CC_PACKAGE_ID = pack.CC_PACKAGE_ID join UDC_ACCOUNTABLE_QUANTITY_VIEW udc on pack.LOGICAL_QUANTITY_CODE = udc.LOGICAL_QUANTITY_CODE and pack.ACCOUNTABLE_QUANTITY_UDMCODE = udc.ACCOUNTABLE_QUANTITY_UDMCODE join mpulknxv nxv on nxv.CC_PACKAGE_ID = attr.CC_PACKAGE_ID join coc_balance_value bal on bal.sncode = nxv.sncode and (bal.COLOR = attr.color or attr.color is null) join mpusntab mp on mp.sncode = bal.sncode join profile_service ps on ps.sncode = bal.sncode where bal.co_id = (select co_id from contract_all where co_code = '${#[PAYM#Portal Registration v2 - CUSTOMER_REGISTERED#Find Active PAYM account]#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CO_CODE[1]}') and attr.CC_PACKAGE_version = (select max(cc_package_version) from coc_ccpackage_thresh_attrs where cc_package_id = attr.cc_package_id) and ps.co_id = bal.co_id and ps.delete_flag is null order by mp.sncode asc

con:request.name: Change Plan to Unlimited Text

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment/>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wrap="http://conductor/planchange/vo/wrapper/" xmlns:vo="http://conductor/planchange/vo/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <wrap:SchedulePlanChange> <wrap:SchedulePlanChangeRequest> <vo:msisdn>${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}</vo:msisdn> <vo:type>SWITCH</vo:type> <vo:newRatePlan>1.u</vo:newRatePlan> <vo:applies>NOW</vo:applies> <vo:discountEuroAmount>0</vo:discountEuroAmount> <vo:recurringMonthCount>0</vo:recurringMonthCount> <vo:salesChannel>online</vo:salesChannel> <vo:agent>SoapUI</vo:agent><vo:penaltyExemption>true</vo:penaltyExemption> </wrap:SchedulePlanChangeRequest> </wrap:SchedulePlanChange> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: select status from plan_change where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and current_rate_plan = '1.t' and new_rate_plan = '1.u' and create_date > sysdate-1

con:condition.con:name: status 0
con:condition.con:targetStep: Wait 10 secs

con:condition.con:name: status 1
con:condition.con:targetStep: Delete any active bundles for account

con:condition.con:name: status -99
con:condition.con:targetStep: Delete any active bundles for account

con:testStep.name: Delete any active bundles for account

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: delete from applied_bundles where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and expiry_time > sysdate

con:testStep.name: Delete any active TRTs for account

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: delete from time_recurring_topups where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and topup_count_remaining <> 0 and status != -99

con:request.name: Change Plan to Colleague Talk

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment/>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wrap="http://conductor/planchange/vo/wrapper/" xmlns:vo="http://conductor/planchange/vo/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <wrap:SchedulePlanChange> <wrap:SchedulePlanChangeRequest> <vo:msisdn>${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}</vo:msisdn> <vo:type>SWITCH</vo:type> <vo:newRatePlan>1.v</vo:newRatePlan> <vo:applies>NOW</vo:applies> <vo:discountEuroAmount>0</vo:discountEuroAmount> <vo:recurringMonthCount>0</vo:recurringMonthCount> <vo:salesChannel>online</vo:salesChannel> <vo:agent>SoapUI</vo:agent><vo:penaltyExemption>true</vo:penaltyExemption> </wrap:SchedulePlanChangeRequest> </wrap:SchedulePlanChange> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: select status from plan_change where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and current_rate_plan = '1.u' and new_rate_plan = '1.v' and create_date > sysdate-1

con:condition.con:name: status 0
con:condition.con:targetStep: Wait 10 secs

con:condition.con:name: status 1
con:condition.con:targetStep: Delete any active bundles for account

con:condition.con:name: status -99
con:condition.con:targetStep: Delete any active bundles for account

con:testStep.name: Delete any active bundles for account

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: delete from applied_bundles where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and expiry_time > sysdate

con:testStep.name: Delete any active TRTs for account

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: delete from time_recurring_topups where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and topup_count_remaining <> 0 and status != -99

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: select status from plan_change where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and current_rate_plan = '1.v' and new_rate_plan = '1.w' and create_date > sysdate-1

con:condition.con:name: status 0
con:condition.con:targetStep: Wait 10 secs

con:condition.con:name: status 1
con:condition.con:targetStep: Delete any active bundles for account

con:condition.con:name: status -99
con:condition.con:targetStep: Delete any active bundles for account

con:testStep.name: Delete any active bundles for account

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: delete from applied_bundles where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and expiry_time > sysdate

con:request.name: Change Plan to Simply Value

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment/>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wrap="http://conductor/planchange/vo/wrapper/" xmlns:vo="http://conductor/planchange/vo/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <wrap:SchedulePlanChange> <wrap:SchedulePlanChangeRequest> <vo:msisdn>${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}</vo:msisdn> <vo:type>SWITCH</vo:type> <vo:newRatePlan>TPG01</vo:newRatePlan> <vo:applies>NOW</vo:applies> <vo:discountEuroAmount>0</vo:discountEuroAmount> <vo:recurringMonthCount>0</vo:recurringMonthCount> <vo:salesChannel>online</vo:salesChannel> <vo:agent>SoapUI</vo:agent><vo:penaltyExemption>true</vo:penaltyExemption> </wrap:SchedulePlanChangeRequest> </wrap:SchedulePlanChange> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: select status from plan_change where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and current_rate_plan = '1.w' and new_rate_plan = 'TPG01' and create_date > sysdate-1

con:testStep.name: Copy of Check if PlanChange Complete

con:condition.con:name: status 0
con:condition.con:targetStep: Wait 10 secs

con:condition.con:name: status 1
con:condition.con:targetStep: Delete any active bundles for account

con:condition.con:name: status -99
con:condition.con:targetStep: Delete any active bundles for account

con:testStep.name: Delete any active bundles for account

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: delete from applied_bundles where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and expiry_time > sysdate

con:testStep.name: Delete any active TRTs for account

con:settings.con:setting: true

con:config.con:query: delete from time_recurring_topups where msisdn = '${#[CR-O2-1101 Balance Presentation Alignment - PAYG#Create and Register New Unlimited Talk Account#CreateAccount]#Response#declare namespace ns13='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns13:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/Msisdn[1]}' and topup_count_remaining <> 0 and status != -99
